Name: Brand of Chaos
Description: After defeating the corresponding elite monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is a rare material mainly used for crafting "Expertise Skill" type Battle Imagine.
Description2$english: A strange mark, the pattern seems to have life. Rather than saying the pattern of the mark is sloppy, it is more like some kind of unfinished evolution, with potential that has not been fully released.
